text.0: wealthwinner dwelling in the sky bringing us vigour with the juice.
text.1: flow to the filter when effused.
text.2: so in thine ancient ways may he beloved with a thousand streams.
text.4: him who is like a caldron shake o indu shake thy gift to us.
text.5: shake it armed warrior with thine arms.
text.6: indu invoked with many a prayer bring down the vigour of these men.
text.7: of him who threatens us with war.
text.8: indu wealthgiver with thine help pour out for us a hundred yea.
text.9: a thousand of thy pure bright streams.
